1-Conver Decimal numbers to binary

5 ==> 101
31  ==> 11111
112 ==> 1110000
255   ===> 11111111


2-convert Binary numbers to Decimal

11110001 ===> 241
11001010 ==> 202
11111111 ==> 255
00011100 ===> 28



3-Convert this text to binary

-Hello ==> 00101101 01001000 01100101 01101100 01101100 01101111
-Python ==> 00101101 01010000 01111001 01110100 01101000 01101111 01101110

4-convert this binary to text

01011001 01101111 1110101 ==> You
01000100 01101001 1100100 ==> Did 
01000111 01101111 1101111 1100100 ==> Good
1001010 01101111 1100010 ==> Job
